LanguageData.BPC.PoliciesConfigText: Create/Delete/Rename policies presets. Don't forget to configure them on each tab afterwards
LanguageData.BPC.DefaultsConfigText: Configure which policies to set once a new pawn joins the colony
LanguageData.BPC.ToggleEmergencyOn: Toggle Emergency OFF. Policies will be set to the previous settings before the emergency
LanguageData.BPC.ToggleEmergencyOff: Toggle Emergency ON. Configure which policies should be activated for all Tabs in the Better Pawn Control configuration cog
LanguageData.BPC.AlertConfigText: Configure which policies to activate when Alert is ON. Use keyboard shortcut to toggle alert ON/OFF
LanguageData.BPC.EmergencyLocationTooltip: The Emergency button is in the lower right side of the game window, next to the toggle buttons
LanguageData.BPC.AutomaticPawnsInterruptSetting: Automatically interrupted whatever pawns are doing when toggling emergency ON?
